general_advisory: Due to forecast of light to moderate rainfall, farmers are advised not to apply fertilizer & chemicals. Strengthen bunds of paddy fields and check for any rat holes or leakage. After rain, trim and clean bunds to avoid insect multiplication.

advisory: Regular monitoring of the crop for incidence of pests and diseases should be done.
Apply Cartap hydrocloride 50SP @ 400g/acre or Fipronil 5 SC @ 400ml/acre after rain.
After rain, there is a chance of insect pest attack. Survey regularly and take action by consulting department personnel.
Go for intercultivation. Consult Gramin Krishi Mausam Sewa for advice.
Go for intercultural operation and apply 26kg urea per acre at 45 days after planting. Apply mulching @ 2t/acre.
Do not allow water to remain stagnant in the field.
Due to weather conditions, there is a chance of Aphids in Maize. Apply Dimethoate @ 2ml/liter of water to manage.
Due to weather, Tikka disease is seen. Manage by spraying Carbendazim @ 2g/liter of water.
Do not allow water stagnation near the root zone to avoid fungal diseases. Drench Carbendazim or Mancozeb @ 2g/lt of water.
Do not allow rainwater to remain stagnant near the base of the plant. Provide stakings to new saplings to prevent wind damage.
To manage Thrips population in chili, spray Imidachloprid or Dimethoate @ 2ml/lt of water.
Provide regular feeding @ 0.35 of body mass.
Provide clean drinking water to poultry and take preventive action against diseases with help from department personnel.
